plugins.name: spop
plugins.description: Spotify Plugin: Browse, Play and discover Spotify Music ATTENTION: Does not work with Software Mixer, use None instead
plugins.details:
Spotify Plugin


Adds Spotify Playback capabilites
Features:
  • Playlists

Note: Requires Spotify premium account.
plugins.author: Volumio Team

plugins.name: youtube
plugins.description: Youtube Plugin for Volumio: Browse, Play and Search your favourite Youtube Music
plugins.details:
Youtube Plugin for Volumio


Adds Youtube Playback capabilites to Volumio
Features:
  • Search for youtube Videos
  • Play trending videos

<
plugins.author: Cristian Pintea, Stefan Laesser

categories.name: miscelleanea
categories.description: Things that cannot go in other categories

plugins.name: touch_display
plugins.description: This Plugin shows the UI to whatever Display attached to the device. It is especially optimized for the 7'' Raspberry PI display.
plugins.author: Volumio Team

plugins.name: gpio-buttons
plugins.description: With this Plugin you can control basic playback funcions by connecting buttons to Raspberry PI GPIOs
plugins.details:
GPIO Buttons Controller


control basic playback funcions by connecting buttons to Raspberry PI GPIOs
Features:
  • Play/pause
  • Next/previous/pause
  • Volume + -

Click here for infos and wiring instructions
plugins.author: Tomatpasser

plugins.name: ir_controller
plugins.description: This plugin allows to control playback or other functions via an IR Remote
plugins.details:
IR Remote Controller Plugin


This Plugin has been sponsored by JustBoom and it works out of the box with JustBoom IR Remote

FEATURES:

  • 3 profiles available (JustBoom IR Remote, Odroid Remote, Apple remote)
  • Controls: Play, pause, mute, volume, next, previous, seek, repeat and random
plugins.author: Volumio Team
